name: Mission Prison Break: Drug Cri
description:
Mission Prison Break: Drug Crime is the game where you escape from the jail with hard time adventure by fighting against jail security. Game is all about escaping, surviving and helping your cell inmate in an island jail. After the successful jailbreak alcatraz jail find your way to survive.
Features:
- Challenging Escape Prison Guard Missions.
- Tremendous visuals and soundtracks.
- Realistic physics and a dynamic damage system.
- Fun Filled Action Prison Life Game!
- Hints and Clues for a best alcatraz prison escaping game
- Breathtaking and destructive game play.
